patthana16.62:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.62:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.62:4.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.62:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
